compliant.section: 您透過本公司網站提交之任何個人資料均由本公司在台灣直接蒐集和處理
基於您的同意，本公司會將您的個人資料傳輸至歐盟以外地區。
compliant.legal provisions: Explicit consent for data transfer outside of EEA

non_compliant.section: 本公司對於此類源於歐盟地區公民之個人資料，所為之直接蒐集與處理，將竭力遵守所適用的歐盟個資保護法律。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data transferred outside EEA must meet GDPR adequacy requirements. "Best efforts" is not sufficient.
non_compliant.amend: Specify the safeguards in place for data transfers outside of the EEA, such as standard contractual clauses, binding corporate rules, or an adequacy decision. Clearly state which mechanism is used to ensure GDPR compliance for EU data.
